page.title: 18Penybedd Farm
page.content: Penybedd Farm is over 200 years old and is one of the oldest farms in the area. Its a mixed farm of 400 acres. There are milking cows, beef cattle, pigs and turkeys on the farm. The farmer's day begins at 7am there are lots of jobs to do _ feeding and cleaning the animals, looking after the fences and buildings and keeping the land in good order. Most of the workers are members of the family but sometimes when they are busy some casual labourers and friends help. There are many pieces of machinery on the farm e.g tractors, ploughs, harrows and rollers.Today machines are bigger, more complex and some are even computerized. Mr Davies goes to Carmarthen mart every week. Help and advice is freely available from ADAS, the Ministry of Agriculture and many of the Feed Firms.
